I'm right here.

Don't fight it.

Jonathan: I wanted to know if she told you about her condition.

Josh: That's great, that's terrific. You can barely manage to stand on your

Josh: Okay, look, I'm not going to pretend like everything's all right

Dinah: Please, we need to talk. Tonight. It's awfully important.

Edmund: Welcome to the world, princess. You know, you're every bit as pretty

Yes, it will. And then bit by bit-- bit by bit-- she's going to go back in love, 
I'll have her again. Just one day at a time. I'll have her-- heart, mind, body

Affects a southern accent ): Hi. 911? Yeah, I'm out here on route 33 and there's

Josh: All right, we are... ...out of here.
Jonathan: What... what the hell are you doing here?
Reva: I was planning on having a drink.
Jonathan: Aren't you on pain meds or something?
Reva: Oh. That's right.

Jonathan: Beat it. You're going to ruin the whole thing. A person who's a

Reva: I told joshua the truth.
Jonathan: What?
Reva: You heard me.
Jonathan: You really are sick, lady.
Reva: I told you I wasn't going to lie to him.
Jonathan: But you're willing to say sayonara to the guy.
Reva: He's not going anywhere.
Jonathan: Well, then you were wrong about him wanting to leave you.
Reva: No, he wants to take care of me.
Jonathan: Cool. Then he'll hang around. That was the whole idea.
Reva: I don't want to talk about it, okay? Let's just forget it.
Jonathan: ( Laughs ) no. Hey.
Reva: What?
Jonathan: Look at me right now. Tell me you don't want josh anymore.

Reva: Of course I want him. If there was ever such a thing as the love of 
one's life, he's it for me.

Jonathan: Well, then you should be jumping for joy. You know what I mean. I

Reva: I want josh to be with me because he loves me, not because he feels

obligation.
Jonathan: Ma, the guy is ga-ga over you. I see it every time he looks at you.
Reva: So do I.

Jonathan: Then what's the obligation? You're it for josh. He's going to hang

Reva: Yeah. You know what? Maybe he will, but that doesn't mean it will make 
him happy.
Jonathan: Why not?
Reva: Because I'm not happy, jonathan.
Jonathan: How come?

Reva: I don't know. But if I can't get josh to leave, then I have to figure 
out a way to make him do it.
Tammy: No, just chicago listings. All right, could I have those, please?

Edmund: Hey, you woke up. Come on. Go to sleep, my little precious one.

Dinah: Where have you been?

Edmund: Where's cassie now?

Edmund: Perfect.
Dinah: What happened to you?

Edmund: Well, I had a flat tire, if you can believe that. But not to worry,

Dinah: Our what?

Edmund: Dinah, we have to leave town. I mean, once cassie finds out that

to be after us, to string us up.
Dinah: Why haven't you mentioned a word about this before?

Edmund: Because this is the surprise I was telling you about. My love, think

petersburg. We are going t going to have the very best of everything, including 
each other, and then in a few months, we can slip back into town quietly and

Dinah: Our farm.

Edmund: Our farm. Dinah, it's my plan, and it's all working out. Trust me. I

Dinah: Cassie's never going to get over this.
Edmund: I know. Isn't it great?

Dinah: Meanwhile, my father is going to hate me, just like everybody else in

Edmund: I thought you didn't care about what anyone else thought. Tell you

Dinah: All right.
Edmund: Good.

Dinah: I'll leave a message for him and, you know, if we tell cassie, we need

ross a videotaped message. That way he'll have something to remember you by.

Sandy: That's a good idea.

Jonathan: Well, well, well. Look who strolled into my humble little watering

Josh: I'm not here looking...

Jonathan: Tomorrow is his first day, actually, to kick in as my official

Jonathan: Who? Reva? No. Why would she be here?

Josh: She snuck out of the hospital. I just had a kind of a hunch that maybe

Jonathan: No. No, that's grape juice, i promise. It's cool. I tell you what,
